LocaleResource.Name: admin.customers.customerreminder.text1
LocaleResource.Value: Abandoned cart – You can set custom reminger to customers who left their carts without confirming order. Activity date is counting "from this date".

LocaleResource.Name: admin.customers.customerreminder.text2
LocaleResource.Value: Registered customer – You can set custom reminder to customers who just register in your store. Activity date is counting from this date.

LocaleResource.Name: admin.customers.customerreminder.text3
LocaleResource.Value: Last purchase – You can set custom reminder to customers who made last purchase to specified date. Activity date is counting "to this date"

LocaleResource.Name: admin.customers.customerreminder.text4
LocaleResource.Value: Last activity – You can set custom reminder to customers who made last activity to specified date. Activity date is counting "to this date".

LocaleResource.Name: admin.customers.customerreminder.text5
LocaleResource.Value: Birthday – You can set custom reminder related to customers birthday (field Activity date is not used).
